message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a rare and valuable item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to pursue.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $1200000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1400000. Let me know if this is more in line with what you're looking for.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $1200000. Would you be willing to consider $1300000?

I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. However, I'm still a bit away from the price I'm looking for. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1350000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, so let me know if this is acceptable to you.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $1200000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1325000. Would you be willing to accept this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too close to the price I was originally looking for. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm counteroffering at $1300000, which is the midpoint of my original offer and your latest counteroffer. This is my final offer, Bob. Let me know if you're willing to meet me here.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at the midpoint, Alice, but I'm still not sure I'm comfortable with $1300000. I'm willing to meet you at $1295000. Would you be willing to accept this price?

I've made a significant concession, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm going to have to draw a line in the sand. I'm counteroffering at $1300000, which is the same price I offered in my previous message. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'm going to have to consider other options.

I understand you're not willing to go any lower, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you at $1285000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I've already made a very significant concession, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $1300000. I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle, and I need to consider other options. I'm willing to make one last attempt to negotiate, but I need to see a serious commitment from you. I'm counteroffering at $1300000, and if you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other buyers. This is my final offer.
